description: Header file defining the BadgerThunderPlugin class, which exposes permission APIs over JSON-RPC in a WPEFramework plugin. It includes method declarations for plugin lifecycle management, JSON-RPC method handlers, and internal helpers.

classes.name: BadgerThunderPlugin
classes.description: A plugin class that provides methods for initializing, deinitializing, and handling JSON-RPC calls related to permission checks and listing capabilities.

methods.name: ~BadgerThunderPlugin
methods.description: Destructor that unregisters JSON-RPC methods and cleans up.

methods.name: Initialize
methods.description: Initializes the plugin during activation by setting up required services.

methods.name: Information
methods.description: Returns diagnostic information about the plugin.

methods.name: endpoint_permissions_listMethods
methods.description: Returns a list of supported permission methods.

methods.name: endpoint_permissions_check
methods.description: Checks if a capability is permitted based on future integration logic.

methods.name: endpoint_permissions_checkAll
methods.description: Stub returning sample permission check results.

methods.name: endpoint_permissions_listCaps
methods.description: Returns a list of all available capabilities.

methods.name: endpoint_permissions_listFireboltPermissions
methods.description: Returns a list of Firebolt/Badger permission IDs.
